whoIsThisTrackFor.courseOffersHeading:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the list of features offered by the course
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Who Is This Track For (RHS panel)
**When Users See This**: When the user is presented with the "Who Is This Track For" section of the welcome modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "The course offers:"
videoRHS.watchThisShortVideo:
**Functional Purpose**: Instructional message for a video explaining learning and practice modes
**UI Location**: Track Welcome Modal → Video RHS panel
**When Users See This**: When the user is presented with the video in the welcome modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text with an emoji. The emoji ☝️ should remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "☝️ Watch this short video to learn more about Learning and Practice Modes, and how to choose the right setup for you."
